resources.string: Please be cautious when taking your dog outside. No more than 20 minutes play outside at a time with shade and water.
Please be very cautious when taking your dog outside. No more than 10 minutes play outside at a time with shade and water.
Please do not play with your dog outside. It is too hot. Dogs should be indoors or in shade with water available.
Please do not play with your dog outside at all. It is too hot. Dogs should be indoors with water available.
